scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "PORT=5001 npm run backend:prepare && npm start --prefix ./PopModel/backend" "NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation PORT=3000 BROWSER=none npm start --prefix ./PopModel/frontend"
scripts.start:auto: npm run ports:free && concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "PORT=5001 npm run backend:prepare && npm start --prefix ./PopModel/backend" "NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation PORT=3000 npm start --prefix ./PopModel/frontend"
scripts.start:single:8080: PORT=8080 npm run build:frontend && PORT=8080 node ./PopModel/backend/server.js
scripts.backend:restart: npm run backend:stop && npm run backend:prepare && npm run backend:start
